transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan, hello?

Customer: Haan, haan. Haan ji kya hua? Pranshu bol raha hu IndiaMART se.

Customer: Haan, haan. Sir, sahi hai na? Nahi, abhi Sachin ji se baat hua tha. Sachin ji se baat hui. Woh abhi matlab haan, subah mein call kiya tha woh phone nahi uthaya. Lekin abhi, abhi kuch der pehle phir mein call kiya tha. Unhone phone uthaya tha. Bata rahe the 10 minute ke baad ek meeting mein hai. 10 minute ke baad ek hum log ke saath meeting karenge.

Executive: Achha.

Customer: Theek hai toh. Nahi, mein unko bata, mein, nahi, nahi, mein unko bataya tha. Mein unko bataya tha, mein yeh jo photo aapne dala, matlab jo, jo maine photo dala tha na, mein unko Piyanshu ji se pehle unko dalte usse permission leke aapko dala. Unhone bataya kuch-kuch photo jo nahi chalega na, woh Piyanshu ji ne mere ko bata diya tha. Woh mein aapko nahi dala. Lekin jo-jo chalega woh aapko dal diya tha. Toh jo usse bhi problem hai toh uss, uss, uss. Reason, reason hota kya hai mein aapko batau. Hota kya hai ki dekhiye ab aapki jo service hai woh koi normal MDC basic service nahi hai. Sabse, sabse top ki service hai. Kyunki ab aap IndiaMART pe sabse upar dekhoge. Ab waha pe agar aapki images vgera aisi waisi padi hongi toh thoda sa IndiaMART ke liye bhi nahi sahi hai aur aapki company ke liye bhi nahi sahi hai. Toh hum log proper images vgera dalte hai. Uss mein kya hota hai ek product ki teen angle, do angle se aur honi chahiye. Achha sir aapke paas kuch photo vgera ho toh aap bhi bhej sakte hai na sir?

Executive: Ab aisa hamare paas koi material rehta nahi hai. Lekin isliye maine bataya toh aap kya karo ki aap Google pe jao. Apne product jaise jo bhi product hai aapke DI pipe aur DI fitting hai na? Aap seedhe Google pe jao. Dalo ductile iron pipe. Theek hai?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Jaise abhi ductile iron pipe maine dal diya hai. Iron pipe. Sir zyadatar images pe IndiaMART ke hi hai sir.

Executive: Haan, saare IndiaMART ke hi hai yeh. Aise inhi ke nikal lijiye aap images vgera. Sab ab jaise ek photo mein padi hui hai. Ek photo ki do angle se aur nikal lijiye aur unko share kar dijiye. Bas yeh dekh lijiye trademark vgera na laga ho. Aur nahi ho pa raha mein batao video meeting kar, link bhej ke aapko batau screen share karke kaise share karke karna hai, kaun si photo karna hai. Nahi, woh usme samajh gaya lekin mein bhi toh matlab hum log ke paas kuch photo hai na woh bhi dal sakte hai. Uss hisab se hum log dalna chahte hai.

Executive: Hum log ke paas jo stock hai. Woh saari kuch pad jayengi. Dekhiye woh padenge saare kuch lekin pehle kya hoti hai puri proper photos chahiye. Ek baar aapki jo service woh matlab aap onboard ho jayegi phir aap koi bhi photo dal sakte ho. But abhi jab tak service hota kya hai na jab service live hoti hai toh uss time pe saara kuch aapki photo matlab profile check hoti hai. Ki aapki photos vgera saari proper honi chahiye. Ki agar man lijiye aap yeh dekhiye sir matlab yeh hona hi sakta na jo aap Sachin ji jo ek baar catalog banaya jo photo bheje na sir hum log uss hisab se ek baar ek catalog bana ke hum log ko pehle dikhayenge na bataya na yeh toh baat hua tha na sir. Ek baar jab, jab aapki live hone wali hogi na woh saara kuch aapko dikhayenge. Haan, haan. Toh isiliye toh live agar dekhiye agar live karna hota toh pehle hi live ho jati. Isiliye toh saara kuch proper diya ja raha hai. Proper aap jab tak nahi karoge tab tak live nahi hogi aapki profile. Aap aur woh bhi ek do din ka hi kaam hai. Aap aaj photo de dijiye kal live ho jayegi aapki service.

Customer: Nahi, matlab jo maine bheja pehle matlab abhi, abhi jo aap aap se discussion karke jo maine kal bheja tha jis din okay bola tha na Sachin ji uss, uss photo ko leke catalog bana ke phir dete toh ek baar sir dekh lete. Abhi dekhiye woh photos kyun nahi, mein catalog banane mein koi problem nahi. Yeh jo photos aapne bheji hai na woh kaisi bheji hai? Man lijiye koi bahar padi hui hai aise hi kahi ki road pe padi hui hai. Woh photos proper hai nahi sir. Mein toh bhi honest batau matlab kahi bhi road pe padi hui hai ya godown mein padi hui hai photos. Matlab hum log photos woh dalte hai jo thoda sa clear ho dekhne mein achhi lage. Isliye baki photo dalne mein koi problem nahi hai woh. But hum IndiaMART ka ek hota hai ki aapko saari proper aap dekhiye kitne aap Google pe search kariye ductile iron pipe jitne bhi competitor IndiaMART pe aare hai sabki proper photos padi hui hai. Aur ek aapki kahi padi hui hai kahi aisi dal de hum godown mein aise hi koi padi hui hai ya road pe pade hue hai aapke product toh woh achha nahi lagega na dekhne mein. Toh hota yeh hai aap ek baar live ho jayegi phir uske baad apne according aap saari photos bhi dal sakte ho. Samajh rahe ho?

Customer: Theek hai sir mein ek baar sir se baat karta hu.

Executive: Ek baar Sachin se baat karke isko aaj live karvao service ko. Photos vgera phir uske baad jitne jo woh mein aapke saare photos add karke dunga. Abhi ke liye proper jo photos vgera dijiye unko. Theek hai ek, ek dekhiye video meeting pe jab woh aaye unko video meeting mein bula lijiyega. Unko bula ke bolna unko photos ek-ek dikha dena ki yeh photos hai, yeh photos hai. Bataiye send karu na karu saara kuch. Theek hai? Ek minute, ek minute sir. Ek minute. Theek hai. Theek hai agar koi problem hota hai video meeting mein turant mujhe call kar lena. Mein bhi aa jaunga meeting mein. Theek hai? Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai. Theek hai. Okay, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's photos not meeting quality standards.

- Wants to upload photos from their stock.

- Wants a catalog made from previously sent photos.



Resolution:

- Executive explained image quality requirements.

- Executive suggested using Google for better images.

- Executive offered assistance via video meeting.

- Executive assured adding customer's photos later.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss with Sachin to live service.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- photos, catalog, quality, service, live
